entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
